page.title: 10Sport in Bridport.
page.content: There are facilities for many sports in the Bridport and West Bay area. In Bridport there is a Bowling Club with an outdoor green and a Tennis Club with two tennis courts. In the valley of the River Brit to the south of Bridport there are sports grounds with Football, Rugby, Hockey and Cricket Clubs. There is also a Squash Club with three courts. Golf can be played at the Bridport and West Dorset Golf Club on East Cliff at West Bay. It has a 5,300 yard course, consisting of two par 5 holes, eight par 4 holes and eight par 3 holes. By the summer of 1986 Bridport will have a fully equipped sports centre adjacent to the existing sports grounds. The centre will include a new sports hall with facilities for many other activities.
